cfafe878-ebd5-4948-81ef-5d7e67570581.description: This badge is intended to for the individuals who are involved in designing, implementing, managing, and auditing ESD control programs in their facilities. Badge earners receive professional program manager certification ensuring the understanding of the standard practices and problem solving techniques used to create an ESD protection program in the workplace. Demonstrates Knowledge, experience, and competency.
cfafe878-ebd5-4948-81ef-5d7e67570581.name: Certified Program Manager

alignments.name: ANSI/ESD S20.20-2014
alignments.description: Standard for the Development of an Electrostatic Discharge Control Program for Protection of Electrical and Electronic Parts, Assemblies and Equipment (Excluding Electrically Initiated Explosive Devices) This standard provides administrative and technical requirements for establishing, implementing and maintaining an ESD Control Program.

badge_template_activities.title: FC100: ESD Basics for the Program Manager (full-day)
FC101: How To's of In-Plant ESD Auditing and Evaluation Measurements (full-day) or: How To's of In-Plant ESD Survey and Evaluation Measurements (full-day)
FC110: Cleanroom Considerations for the Program Manager (half-day) Available Online
FC120: Ionization Issues and Answers for the Program Manager (half-day) Available Online
DD/FC130: System Level ESD/EMI: Testing to IEC and Other Standards (half-day) Available Online
FC200: Packaging Principles for the Program Manager (half-day) Available Online
FC210: ESD Association Standards Overview (half-day) Available Online or: ESD Standards Overview for the Program Manager (half-day)
FC215: Device Technology and FA Overview (half-day) Available Online
DD/FC 380: Electrostatic Calculations for the Program Manager and the ESD Engineer(half-day) Available Online or: Electrostatic Calculations for the ESD Engineer (half-day)
FC340: ESD Program Development & Assessment (ANSI/ESD S20.20 Seminar) (2-days)
Pass in-depth Examination

e60bde22-8b16-461b-abcf-9615428b0313.description: This certification ensures that a person has the latest information on the ESD standards used in the industry along with an overview of the technical background to perform the tests or understand the testing results. In addition to learning the recommended test methodologies, a person will be exposed to common pitfalls in interpreting the standards and applying it to the testing procedures used in the lab. No other ESD/Latch-Up stress testing program is offered in the Semiconductor Industry.
e60bde22-8b16-461b-abcf-9615428b0313.name: Device Stress Test Certification

badge_template_activities.title: ESD FUNDAMENTALS I FOR STRESS TESTING
ESD FUNDAMENTALS II FOR STRESS TESTING
HIGH SPEED DIGITAL OSCILLOSCOPE FUNDAMENTALS
HBM TESTING ESSENTIALS
CDM TESTING ESSENTIALS
ESSENTIALS FOR CONTROLLING THE ESD WORK AREA
ADVANCED HBM – DEALING WITH TESTER PARASITICS, HIGH PIN COUNT AND TWO PIN TESTING
FUNDAMENTALS OF FAILURE ANALYSIS
2 Elective Courses

a293d72e-f149-4c9c-931e-321772772583.description: EOS/ESD Association’s ESD Control Program Auditor certification provides an understanding of the ANSI/ESD S20.20-2021 standard and how its requirements provide a framework to control the risks of electrostatic discharge (ESD) within an organization. The certification teaches the knowledge and skills needed to successfully integrate ESD Control Program audits within an organization’s quality management system internal audit program.
a293d72e-f149-4c9c-931e-321772772583.name: ESD Control Program Auditor Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Learning Objectives: Upon completion of this training, individuals will be able to: Understand electrostatic discharge (ESD) control program definitions, concepts, and guidelines Understand fundamentals of electrical theory & electrostatics and the applicability to an ESD Control Program Understand the purpose and requirements of ANSI/ESD 20.20-2021 Successfully apply knowledge and skills gained to audit an organization’s ESD Control program

8ec886ab-cdce-42ca-8b30-9fc5e9be6014.description: This is comprised of three online classes and a knowledge assessment test. It provides the Basics of ESD, necessary fundamental information, the How To’s of measurement and equipment, and a one-day S20.20 class meant to provide an introduction to control program basics and auditing.
8ec886ab-cdce-42ca-8b30-9fc5e9be6014.name: ESD Program Associate Certification

alignments.name: ANSI/ESD S20.20-2014
alignments.description: Standard for the Development of an Electrostatic Discharge Control Program for Protection of Electrical and Electronic Parts, Assemblies and Equipment (Excluding Electrically Initiated Explosive Devices) This standard provides administrative and technical requirements for establishing, implementing and maintaining an ESD Control Program.

badge_template_activities.title: FC100: ESD Basics for the Program Manager (full-day)
FC101: How To's of In-Plant ESD Auditing and Evaluation Measurements (full-day) or: How To's of In-Plant ESD Survey and Evaluation Measurements (full-day)
FC340: ESD Program Development & Assessment (ANSI/ESD S20.20 Seminar) (1-day)
Pass knowledge assessment test

890f0120-e059-4d55-b111-86ccc3e97a00.description: ESD Compliance Verification Technician Certification is based on the ESDA's technical report, ESD-TR53 Compliance Verification of ESD Protective Equipment and Materials. This important document supports and maintains static control programs designed around ANSI/ESD S20.20 Standard for the Development of an Electrostatic Discharge Control Program for Protection of Electrical and Electronic Parts, Assemblies and Equipment, and the European technically equivalent standard IEC 61340-5-1.
890f0120-e059-4d55-b111-86ccc3e97a00.name: ESD Compliance Verification Technician to TR53

alignments.name: ESD TR53-01-22
alignments.description: ESD TR53-01 is technically equivalent to IEC 61340-5-4.(Revision of ESD TR53-01-18, the 2018 version will remain available until June 30, 2023)ESD Association Technical Report for the Protection of Electrostatic Discharge Susceptible Items – Compliance Verification of ESD Protective Equipment and MaterialsThe purpose of this technical report

badge_template_activities.title: Successful candidates demonstrate an understanding ESD phenomenon and relevance, all measurement techniques for compliance verification as defined in TR53 and the correlation to an ESD control program, and troubleshoot ESD protective items and corrective actions.

05bf20b1-6761-41f2-b515-f120abcb19c8.description: The EOS/ESD Association’s ESD for Circuit Design Engineers Certification provides the circuit design engineer with the knowledge and the skills to implement ESD protection circuits and latch-up mitigation on their integrated circuit (IC) designs using industry-proven best practices.
05bf20b1-6761-41f2-b515-f120abcb19c8.name: ESD for Circuit Design Engineer Certification

badge_template_activities.title: BACKGROUND OF ESD BASICS AND MODELS, BASICS OF ESD AND LATCH-UP DEVICE PHYSICS, ESD CIRCUIT-CHIP DESIGN IMPLEMENTATION (WITH LAYOUT PRINCIPLES) CMOS, ESD CIRCUIT-CHIP DESIGN IMPLEMENTATION (WITH LAYOUT PRINCIPLES) MIXED-SIGNAL HIGH-VOLTAGE, ESD EDA VERIFICATION TOOLS, ESD COMPACT MODELS AND SIMULATION, ESD LATCH-UP PRODUCT TESTING BASICS, ESD LATCHUP FAILURES TROUBLESHOOTING TECHNIQUES AND CASE STUDIES, ESD FACTORY BASICS FOR DESIGN ENGINEERS, ESD SYSTEM LEVEL BASICS.
